_header: Herb florenti to a herb with flower spread
_description: Verse translation of phrases in a Latin sermon — three couplets with Latin internal rhymes

CULKk424.First Lines:
herbe florenti To a ȝerbe with floure spredNubi volitanti To a
                    cloud with wynd yled…
CULKk424.Last Lines:
…cursori diligenti To a currour of lytyl reste& ruibre
                    defici[ ]ti And to an vn couen geste
